body: @-Revan- Thanks for translating the chapter 1 much appreciated 👍

Oh. Seems that I should have put an explanation here. But first: Hi! Editor's here. For those who were wondering "Why did they translate Ch2 before Ch1?", well, as I said on E-h, when I found this work, I looked for the Ch1... But the problem was that I looked for works that were uploaded BEFORE ch2 and... well... Ch2 had been uploaded first. Of course, I found Ch1 after that but I had already started the bounty for ch2 and I was too lazy to modifiy it to target Ch1. Yep. That's literally the reason.
Btw, as soon as this translation was released, I started another bounty for Ch1. This bounty is now over and I'll work begin to edit it (first need to finish another work).
